armyRules.name: Shield of Azyr
armyRules.description: Pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 5+.

armyRules.name: Storm Charge
armyRules.description: Pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit that is not within 3" of any enemy units. That unit can attempt a charge even if it ran in the same turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Blaze of Glory
regimentAbilities.frequency: Once per battle, any combat phase
regimentAbilities.description: Pick a friendly unit in combat and until the end of the phase each time a model from that unit is slain roll a D6. On a 4+ an enemy unit in combat with that unit takes 1 mortal wound.

regimentAbilities.name: Strike Where Needed
regimentAbilities.description: Select a unit. For this unit no mortal damage is inflicted when retreating and then can still charge this turn.

enhancements.name: Hallowed Scrolls
enhancements.description: The bearer has a ward of 5+.

ability.name: Ward (5+)
ability.description: For every point damage inflicted on this unit, roll a D6 and on a 5+ that damage is ignored

ability.name: Crit (Mortal)
ability.description: If you roll a Critical Hit when attacking with this weapon, that attack inflicts mortal damage on the target equal to the weapon's Damage characteristic, instead of the normal damage.

enhancements.name: Null Pendant
enhancements.frequency: Once per battle, end of any turn
enhancements.description: Roll a dice for each enemy unit contesting the same objective as your general . On a 2+ subtract the roll from the control score of that unit this turn.

ability.name: Null Pendant
ability.description: Roll a dice for each enemy unit contesting the same objective as your general. On a 2+ subtract the roll from the control score of that unit this turn.
ability.frequency: Once per battle, end of any turn

enhancements.name: Quicksilver Draught
enhancements.frequency: Once per battle, any combat phase
enhancements.description: Your general has Strike-First this phase

ability.name: Quicksilver Draught
ability.description: Your general has Strike-First this phase
ability.frequency: Once per battle, any combat phase

abilities.name: Companion
abilities.description: Unless otherwise specified, attacks made by this weapon cannot get an improvement to their hit, wound or weapon characteristics.

abilities.name: Deliver Judgement
abilities.frequency: Once per battle, any combat phase
abilities.description: Declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. Effect: The target can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the phase.

abilities.name: Plan the Attack
abilities.description: Declare: Pick an objective you do not control. Effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly units that target enemy units contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Anti-Wizard (+1 Rend)
abilities.description: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of attacks made with this weapon that target a WIZARD.

abilities.name: Anti-Priest (+1 Rend)
abilities.description: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of attacks made with this weapon that target a PRIEST.

abilities.name: Sense Unholy Sorcery
abilities.description: This unit's Gryph-crow is a token. This unit has WARD (5+) while its Gryph-crow is on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified ward roll of 1 for this unit, remove its Gryph-crow from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Cleansing Fires
abilities.description: Declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6. Effect: On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal wound on the target unit.

abilities.name: Crit (Mortal)
abilities.description: If you roll a Critical Hit when attacking with this weapon, that attack inflicts mortal damage on the target equal to the weapon's Damage characteristic, instead of the normal damage.

abilities.name: Crit (Mortal)
abilities.description: If you roll a Critical Hit when attacking with this weapon, that attack inflicts mortal damage on the target equal to the weapon's Damage characteristic, instead of the normal damage.

abilities.name: Stalwart Defenders
abilities.description: Add 3 to the control characteristic of this unit while it contests an objective wholly within friendly territory.

abilities.name: Heralds of Righteousness
abilities.description: When you make a charge roll for this unit, roll 1 additional dice and disregard the lowest roll.

abilities.name: Skirmishers
abilities.description: Models in this unit can move within 2" of each other horizontally and 6" of each other vertically, instead of 1" and 5" respectively.
